description: four letter site code for a 50m x 50m quadrat
unique sample id that is a combination of the site code, sampling type (LS = leaf sifter), year (04 = 2004, 05 = 2005, 06 = 2006), subplot (A, B, C, or D), and sample number (1-4)
a subplot code (A, B, C, or D) which designates which 10m x 10m corner of the 50 m x 50 m site the samples were collected from
the 1m x 1m sample number, four of which were collected in each subplot to make a total of 16 samples per site
the UTM northing (i.e., y-coordinate) of the centroid of the site in meters
the UTM easting (i.e., x-coordinate) of the centroid of the site in meters
the latitude of the site in decimal degrees
the longitude of the site in decimal degrees
the elevation of the site in meters
the UTM easting (i.e., x-coordinate) of the 1m^2 sample (not the site) in meters
the UTM northing (i.e., y-coordinate) or the 1m^2 sample (not the site) in meters
